程序包 org.springframework.cloud.gateway.support

接口 ArgumentHints

  • 所有已知子接口:
    GatewayFilterFactory, RoutePredicateFactory
    所有已知实现类:
    AddRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactory, AddRequestParameterGatewayFilterFactory, AddResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory, AfterRoutePredicateFactory, BeforeRoutePredicateFactory, BetweenRoutePredicateFactory, CookieRoutePredicateFactory, HeaderRoutePredicateFactory, HostRoutePredicateFactory, HystrixGatewayFilterFactory, MethodRoutePredicateFactory, PathRoutePredicateFactory, PrefixPathGatewayFilterFactory, QueryRoutePredicateFactory, RedirectToGatewayFilterFactory, RemoteAddrRoutePredicateFactory, RemoveNonProxyHeadersGatewayFilterFactory, RemoveRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactory, RemoveResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory, RequestRateLimiterGatewayFilterFactory, RewritePathGatewayFilterFactory, SecureHeadersGatewayFilterFactory, SetPathGatewayFilterFactory, SetResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory, SetStatusGatewayFilterFactory, ThrottleGatewayFilterFactory
    public interface ArgumentHints

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      default java.util.List<java.lang.String> argNames()
      Returns hints about the number of args and the order for shortcut parsing.
      default void validate​(int requiredSize, org.springframework.tuple.Tuple args)
      args长度是否为requiredSize
      default boolean validateArgs()
      Validate supplied argument size against {@see #argNames} size.
      default void validateMin​(int minSize, org.springframework.tuple.Tuple args)
      args数量至少为minSize
